text: Testing your app is done against permutations of devices and operating systems.
Do your intial and exploratory testing in the most used os/device. This guide will use an Android Device Emulator.
Launch your emulator. See https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html for details.
Select the Play button, wait 5 seconds, and then press the Stop button.
Verify: The time is near to 5 seconds.
Open Android Studio's Android Profiler. See https://developer.android.com/studio/profile/android-profiler.html for details.
Using an installed app (not the Clock app), run through a test while the Android Profiler is attached to the process.
Check for spikes in CPU, Memory, and Network usage as you test and as the app sits unused.
